data.author: Lauren Penington
data.title: 1 dead, 1 injured in fatal Denver crash near Windsor Lake
data.description: One person died and another was injured in a Thursday morning, single-vehicle crash in Denver's Windsor neighborhood.

data.author: Emily Arseneau
data.title: Paddleboarder identified from weekend drowning at Rampart Reservoir
data.description: TELLER COUNTY, Colo. (KRDO) - The El Paso County Coroner has identified the paddleboarder who died over the weekend in Rampart Reservoir. RELATED: Rescue teams search for missing person in the Rampart Reservoir The coroner identified him as 25-year-old Theodis "Otis" Forrest Jr. A GoFundMe says, "Otis was a bright light in this world -The post Paddleboarder identified from weekend drowning at Rampart Reservoir appeared first on KRDO.

data.title: Control and Alan Wake to get film and TV adaptations with new deal
data.description: Remedy and Annapurna have partnered up, giving the film studio the film and TV rights to Control and Alan Wake.

data.author: Associated Press
data.title: Yemen’s Houthi rebel video shows they planted bombs on tanker now threatening Red Sea oil spill
data.description: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) — Yemen’s Houthi rebels have released footage showing that they boarded and intentionally set explosives aboard a Greek-flagged tanker that was abandoned after they repeatedly attacked it, putting the Red Sea at risk of a major oil spill. The Houthis chanted their group’s motto as the set explosives detonated aboardThe post Yemen’s Houthi rebel video shows they planted bombs on tanker now threatening Red Sea oil spill appeared first on KION546.

data.author: Business Wire
data.title: Ververica Achieves SOC 2 Certification, Strengthening Commitment to Information Security
data.description: Enhancing customer data protection with industry-leading security and compliance standards. BERLIN — Ververica, the original creators of Apache Flink and a leader in real-time data streaming, today announced it successfully achieved AICPA Service Organization Control (SOC) 2 Type I certification. This certification, audited by Prescient Assurance, a global leader in security and compliance certifications for […]

data.title: Trump Aide ‘Abruptly Pushed Aside’ an Arlington Cemetery Official, the Army Says
data.description: The statement from the Army is the first detailed description of an altercation that took place on Monday, as Mr. Trump appeared for a wreath-laying ceremony.
